boofcv.alg.sfm.d2
Class RenderImageMotion<I extends ImageSingleBand,O extends ImageBase>

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.sfm.d2.RenderImageMotion<I,O>

public class RenderImageMotion<I extends ImageSingleBand,O extends ImageBase>
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a mosaic by batching together smaller images with their respective transforms. This class lends itself towards mosaics that are sequentially built from video images as they arrive.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Adds the current frame to the mosaic

Parameters:
frame - Gray scale image of the current frame.
buffImage - Color image of the current frame.
worldToCurr - Transformation from the world into the current frame.
